mapper.insert: INSERT INTO silvers ( login_id, password, name, gender, caregiver_id, birthday ) VALUES ( #{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{caregiverId}, #{birthday} )
INSERT INTO silvers_images (silver_id, original_filename, stored_filename) VALUES (#{silverId}, #{originalFilename}, #{storedFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM silvers WHERE login_id = #{loginId}

SELECT s.id AS s_id, s.login_id AS s_login_id, s.password AS s_password, s.name AS s_name, s.gender AS s_gender, s.created_at AS s_created_at, s.caregiver_id AS s_caregiver_id, si.id AS si_id, si.silver_id AS si_silver_id, si.original_filename AS si_original_filename, si.stored_filename AS si_stored_filename FROM silvers s LEFT JOIN silvers_images si ON s.login_id = si.silver_id WHERE s.login_id = #{loginId}

SELECT s.id AS s_id, s.login_id AS s_login_id, s.password AS s_password, s.name AS s_name, s.gender AS s_gender, s.created_at AS s_created_at, s.caregiver_id AS s_caregiver_id, si.id AS si_id, si.silver_id AS si_silver_id, si.original_filename AS si_original_filename, si.stored_filename AS si_stored_filename FROM silvers s LEFT JOIN silvers_images si ON s.login_id = si.silver_id WHERE s.id = #{id}
